text: @CyrilRamaphosa @MYANC President @CyrilRamaphosa , please listen to the MAJORITY of the people! PLEASE! FFS! Black and white needs you to listen to the masses! Jou Ministers adviseer jou verkeerd, luister na die mense! #COVID19 #ZindziMandela #MandelaDay
